summary:
Modifies the Mage Armor perk and greatly extends the *flesh spells.
(Oakflesh, Stoneflesh, Ironflesh, Ebonyflesh, and Dragonhide.)
descriptionHtml:
Modifies the Mage Armor perk and the *flesh spells.
(Oakflesh, Stoneflesh, Ironflesh, Ebonyflesh, and Dragonhide.)

Makes The Spells do nothing without the Mage armor perk. When you have mage armor though, the effects are the same as Vanilla, but last for 1 hour. A level 0 mage armor perk has been added, and is be purchasable at level 10 Alteration.

I feel like this balances out the Alteration School, while making it into a useful thing to have for mages. 

I am open to suggestions regarding balance/effect. Message me on here or email me.
The.Highpander@gmail.com
author: The Highpander
